QuestData.Title: A Lesson Learned
QuestData.Description: We need to show those flayers what happens when you mess with Oronok's business!$B$BI want you to go back to the Shattered Plains and destroy every flayer egg that you see. They'll be deep in flayer territory so keep your guard up.
QuestData.LogDescription: Oronok Torn-heart at Oronok's Farm in Shadowmoon Valley wants you to destroy 10 Ravenous Flayer Eggs on the Shattered Plains.
QuestData.RewardText: That'll teach those damned, filthy animals not to kill my boars! Well done, $n!
